eas_text: A civil authority has issued A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Travis; Williamson; Hays, TX; at 05:45 PM ON JAN 26, 2026 Effective until 05:45 AM JAN 27, 2026. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: ATC EOC: Avoid unnecessary travel. Stay off roads overnight to ensure your safety. Road conditions pose significant risks to drivers and pedestrians. Crews are at work restoring roads to safe conditions. Updates will be provided at AustinTexas.gov/alerts.
